column4: hey, when i log in i get a message sayin: Run as root - KDE su in which there's a command sayin: nautilus'-sm-config-prefix'  and asking me to put the root pasword... what is that? any idea?
u're smart dude u know, of course i dont, am askin u y it's requiring a password?
the program needs root permission to run (lots of programs need root access)
